meanings.definition: To pass or spread through every part of
meanings.sent1: The scent of fresh flowers interpermeates the entire room.
meanings.sent2: The sunlight interpermeates the leaves of the trees in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The laughter of the children interpermeates the quiet library, causing a few smiles.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness interpermeates every interaction, leaving a lasting impact on others.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of baking bread interpermeates the neighborhood, making everyone hungry.

meanings.sent1: The friendship between the two interpermeates their lives, bringing them closer together.
meanings.sent2: The music and lyrics interpermeate perfectly in this song, creating a beautiful harmony.
meanings.sent3: The flavors of the dish interpermeate in a delightful dance on the taste buds.
meanings.sent4: Their thoughts and emotions interpermeate, creating a deep connection between them.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the painting interpermeate seamlessly, blending into a stunning masterpiece.
